sub_title: Sales | Online | Marketing Pro | Creating momentum and making things happen 🌐
summary:
I am an enthusiastic driven professional, with a broad international and intercultural background in leadership, marketing and sales. I am used to working and travelling on an international level for a high-tech Japanese A-brand. Strong knowledge of the BtoB markets, self-starter, entrepreneur and new business creator, reliable with a successful track record of making things happen. My key competence is combining leadership, marketing and sales experience with a strong sensibility for finding the right momentum creating the business.

My personal trademark is that I combine my creative and energetic drive to sincerely connect with the people around me, to build the bridge between theory and practice. It's my goal to jointly achieve the best result by empowering others by going the extra mile myself. Never take no for an answer with a positive way of thinking. 

Experiences; In the professional B2B area, starting-up new businesses or implementing renewed strategies, team motivation, marketing and sales within a multinational and small size enterprise, large-scale short-term projects and used to work on an international level in a multilingual environment in English, German and Dutch.

Specialties; Sales & Marketing, Leadership, Creating New Business Opportunities, Setting Goals, (Sales) Team Motivation, Creative Thinking, Personal Relations, Branding, Hands on Mentality, Authentic and Broadcast Industry.

I am available for a new ambitious sales and/or Marketing challenge in a senior management role.

Feel free to contact:
Cell Phone: +31 (0)6 - 155 155 10  
Email: pasveer@xs4all.nl

treasury_media.title: Fundraising via SeriousRequest
treasury_media.description: Serious Request is a family of annual multi-day, multimedia fundraising events for International Red Cross initiatives, typically hosted by radio stations in the week before Christmas. The project was begun in 2004 by Dutch public pop music radio station 3FM. Serious Request projects have since been adopted in Belgium, Switzerland, Sweden, Kenya, South Korea, Austria, Latvia and Portugal.

treasury_media.title: Samenwerking JVCKenwood en KOPexpo
treasury_media.description: KOPexpo's proactive no-nonsense attitude gave us the confidence to enter into a first collaboration. Especially the flexible attitude and the ability to switch at the last minute has been a decisive factor for us to enter into a longer collaboration. In the meantime, KOPexpo has realized two international stands for the IBC, International Broadcast Convention in the Rai Amsterdam and has provided the design and implementation of our European Roadshow Mini. In short, a pleasant collaboration.

projects.title: GoLive European roadshow
projects.description:
Creator, initiator and Project owner of the GoLive European roadshow; 
The GoLive roadshow is created around a Mini Clubman, build as a mini OB-van incl. satellite disk, 4G or WiFi live video productions equipment, camera's, tripods, mic's and monitors. The concept behind this setup was primarily helping dealers and installers to understand the JVC low-cost proposition of live video production anywhere any time around the globe.

projects.title: Handbook Company film production | Marketing cooperation with author Hay Stevens
projects.description:
Initiator, project owner of the Marketing cooperation with Hay Stevens, author Book company film productions, creations of a guide (hands-on bible) for independent filmmakers;
Never before has the knowledge and experience of a producer of company films been explained so clearly or been made so freely accessible. In this book, the author explains how to write a script for a company film, how to film it and how to create something exciting in the edit. There has never before been a learning and management book about this subject! This is why this book is unique and a must for anyone wanting to develop their skills as a maker of company films by using JVC equipment.

projects.title: Surfing on Light, Jan de Bont, Atelier HSL
projects.description:
Project Jan de Bont Hollywood director Speed1, Twister, Speed2, Cruise Control Atelier HSL Surfing on Light 3-D showwcase

“Surfing on Light” by Jan de Bont. ”You are floating on sound while surfing on light in full 3D surround”.  More than two years ago, Atelier HSL (they provide art projects around the Hi-Speed train Amsterdam/Paris) decided to ask Jan de Bont to create a "speed" experience. And to their great surprise, he said: “yes, that sounds like fun!”... Jan then put a proposal on paper, followed by the associated (art) budget. Jan de Bont: “A year and a half later, the telephone rang and – which I had not expected at all – Nelly Voorhuis from Atelier HSL said that she had collected the money and that it could now happen very quickly”.  The 3rd part, the projection, was perhaps the biggest challenge. How do you show four 3D projections at the same time? It's never been done before, so no one could guarantee it would work. One thing we knew for sure: we didn't want active 3D (with a transmitter that sends a signal to your glasses). We were pretty sure that wouldn't work with multiple 3D projections. So we opted for passive 3D, but for that you suddenly need 8 professional projectors and it was only when Paul Pasveer of JVC-Benelux offered to sponsor the project that Atelier-HSL gave the "go" to actually implement the project.  In the end we worked for three days with nine people in LP2 (Rotterdam) on the construction of the installation. On Tuesday evening Jan arrived (directly from LA) to have a look at his installation for the first time. Until now everyone had only seen the separate parts and for the first time everything came together. Jan de Bont: “That was truly a magical moment”. The “making of” can be found at www.lp2.nl and at www.vimeo.com. You can see an impression of the installation at www.DWDD.nl (the Jackals of October 8, 1011).

profile_positions.description: re-MARKET helps companies move forward in times of change or the absence of sales and marketing management. Carries out projects aimed at transforming both online and offline sales and marketing activities. re-MARKET also acts as a temporary project department that investigates, supervises and implements, SEO, analytics, social media, exhibitions, roadshows, dealer events, product introductions, sales support, project management, etc.
profile_positions.title: Interimprofessional

profile_positions.description: Brexit aan Zee started with a Facebook event post. Now 12 thousand people want to join us out of the 86 thousand people interested! On the 31st of October, the village of Wijk aan Zee transforms in a small version with the best the countries of the EU have to offer in culture, food & drinks as we wave GB goodbye.  - Join us on www.brexitaanzee.nl -
profile_positions.title: Sales & Sponsorships

profile_positions.description: Establishment of JVCKENWOOD professional as a solid player in the EMEA/Russia broadcasting and AV-market. Putting the right processes in place to professionalize the company and support seven European branch offices. Ensured proper communication with all branches to facilitate and executed marketing plans and sales programs. Managing European A&P budget and all relevant EMEA trade, dealer and road shows. Leading two marketing departments in Frankfurt and London, led product launches, created web portals, implemented social selling, SEO, CPO, CPL and multichannel strategies. Developing and launching integrated, multichannel, print, catalogue, web, press and direct marketing campaigns. Building the brand and gaining market share.
profile_positions.title: Strategic Marketing Manager,  European Professional Business

profile_positions.description: European marketing manager combined with the responsibility as GM for the two local branch offices in the Netherlands and Belgium during the merger between JVC Professional Europe Ltd. and Kenwood. It was a double function until the Dutch and Belgium branch was harmonised into the new JVCKENWOOD cooperation.
profile_positions.title: European Marketing Manager

profile_positions.description: Established JVC Professional Europe Ltd. in the Benelux as a solid player in the AV-market. Helped recruit & train the right people, grew the business from scratch. Put the right processes in place to professionalize the Benelux Company. Developed and executed Benelux marketing plans and programs, both short and long-term to ensure profit growth and market share.

profile_positions.description: Established JVC Professional Europe Ltd. in the Netherlands as a solid player in the AV-market. Helped recruit & train the right people, grew the business from scratch. profile_positions.description: In charge of the daily operation of a wholesale company specialized in the import and distribution of Taiwanese scooters en Swiss bicycles. Six FTE, turnover 3.2 million. Sales and distribution via an exclusive dealer network of retailers in the Benelux market. The company was virtually bankrupt but needed a young potential to get the company on track. After two successful years, the company was sold to a strategic partner.
